predicate.note: Frames file for 'cackle' based on sentences in BROWN. VN entry in class animal_sounds-38.

roleset.name: make the noise of a hen

example.name: intransitive
example.text: He stroked the hens and they responded with delighted clucks , he gobbled with the turkeys and they at once were all attention , he quacked with the ducks , and cackled with a pair of exceedingly flattered geese .
example.arg: with a pair of exceedingly flattered geese
